{"name":"Json_comparision","engineVariableName":"","components":[{"udfNames":[],"componentId":0,"componentName":"startComponent","tableName":"","category":"Start","componentType":"UDF","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":0,"dependencies":[],"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.UDFComponent","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"Y"},{"format":"json","enableSchema":"N","schema":[],"fileMetadata":[],"enableTrim":"N","failComponentWhenDatasetEmpty":"N","componentId":4,"componentName":"Json_Bank_Loans","tableName":"Json_Bank_Loans","category":"Source","componentType":"File","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"JSON","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[],"options":{"mode":"PERMISSIVE","dateFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd","multiLine":"true","timestampFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd 'T' HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX","path":"oracle_bank_loans_data.json","inferSchema":"true"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.FileComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"N"},{"format":"json","enableSchema":"N","schema":[],"fileMetadata":[],"enableTrim":"N","failComponentWhenDatasetEmpty":"N","componentId":7,"componentName":"T_Json_Bank_Loans","tableName":"T_Json_Bank_Loans","category":"Source","componentType":"File","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"JSON","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[],"options":{"mode":"PERMISSIVE","dateFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd","multiLine":"true","timestampFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd 'T' HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX","path":"teradata_bank_loans_data.json","inferSchema":"true"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.FileComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":5,"componentName":"Json_Transform","tableName":"Json_Transform","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[4],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT
    customer_id,
    name,
    phone_number,
    age,
    gender,
    income,
    expenditure,
    current_loan_amount,
    current_emi_amount,
    requested_loan_amount,
    requested_emi_amount,

    CASE
        WHEN loan_approval = 1 THEN 'Approved'
        ELSE 'Rejected'
    END AS loan_approval_status,
    
    case
        when IS_LEGIT=1 then 'Legit'
        when IS_LEGIT=0 then 'Fraud'
    end as is_legit,

    -- credit_score_rating
    CASE
        WHEN credit_score < 580 THEN 'Poor'
        WHEN credit_score < 670 THEN 'Fair'
        WHEN credit_score < 740 THEN 'Good'
        WHEN credit_score < 800 THEN 'Very Good'
        ELSE 'Excellent'
    END AS credit_score_rating,

    -- combine address fields
    CONCAT_WS(
        ', ',
        address_line1,
        address_line2,
        city,
        state,
        country,
        CAST(pincode AS STRING)
    ) AS customer_address
    
    

FROM Oracle
"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"sourceDataFrame":"Json_Transform","targetDataFrame":"T_Json_Bank_Loans","mapping":[{"sourceColumn":"customer_id","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"customer_id","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"Y","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"name","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"name","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"phone_number","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"phone_number","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"age","sourceType":"decimal(3,0)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(3,0)","targetColumn":"age","targetType":"long","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"long","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"gender","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"gender","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","upperThreshold":0.0,"lowerThreshold":0.0,"thresholdUnit":"","hasThreshold":"N"},{"sourceColumn":"income","sourceType":"decimal(18,2)","sourceDa
